spread.description: Bid-ask spread as percentage of price

state_descriptions.1: Organic growth driven by real usage of the token within the ecosystem
state_descriptions.2: Stable equilibrium supported by consistent utility usage
state_descriptions.3: Price driven by speculation rather than fundamentals
state_descriptions.4: Token price moves independently of broader market, driven by internal factors
state_descriptions.5: Price supported by newly added liquidity rather than organic demand
state_descriptions.6: Activity driven by reward programs rather than organic utility
state_descriptions.7: Incentive programs failing to retain value - rewards sold immediately
state_descriptions.8: Sustained decline in all metrics without external shock
state_descriptions.9: Thin liquidity causes disproportionate price impact from small orders
state_descriptions.10: Chaotic price movements driven by news/social narratives without fundamental driver
state_descriptions.11: System transitioning from one stable regime to another
state_descriptions.12: Slow decay without capitulation - gradual loss of interest and value

notes.calibration: These thresholds require calibration on real historical data
